item.description:
Hello Folks-

We've got a fun weekend planned for you on March 26 up at the Innitou Ski Runners

The cost for this weekend will be $105 for guests and includes the following:

Two night stay at the ski house (Friday and Saturday night)
3 private parties w/ round-trip transportation provided
BBQ lunch on Saturday
Pizza Party Dinner on Saturday w/ pizza, baked ziti and salad

Discount tickets may be available for those interested for an additional cost.

What you will need to bring:
Bedding for a single bed (sheets with blanket or sleeping bag)
Pillow
Towel(s) for shower
Toiletries

Advance payment will be required to guarantee your spot. Payment may be sent by check. Credit card payments are accepted via Paypal for a small convenience charge. More information will be sent to those planning to attend.

Space is limited and will be filling up fast so don't miss out! Please RSVP prior to March 20.
item.how_to_find_us: Some members will be heading up Thurs night to ski Fri if anyone's interested. (Addtl cost will apply)

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Innitou Guest Weekend Package
